name: jogger
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] someone who jogs as a form of exercise: You always see joggers in the park on Saturday mornings. She's petite, with a jogger's lean physique.
skynesher/E+/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesAn avid jogger, he completed the New York marathon in 3 hours.In Vancouver, joggers abound, day and night.A spate of mountain lion attacks has joggers avoiding suburban parks.

joggers
[ plural ] loose informal trousers that fit tightly around the ankles, often made of thick cotton, that are worn for running or are in the style of trousers designed for running: I usually just wear joggers and a T-shirt when I'm at home.
